Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: Various people from around the world have been discussing on social media the upcoming federal budget in Australia sure to mention the pressing need for funding of mental health and other matters like sporting facilities. They want better welfare support for everyone not ignoring disabled Australians whilst favoring single parents. In the midst of all of these a call has been made for the eradication of jellyfish. An exclusive podcast discussing these issues meanwhile is available for subscription. #NewPoliticPod2019 #RaiseTheRate #NDIS #EradicateJellyfishNow #MayBudget #AusPol
